alert.note: Alert for Attala; Holmes (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 7:53PM CDT until April 13 at 12:08AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Black River At West affecting Holmes and Attala Counties. Big Black River Near Bentonia affecting Madison and Yazoo Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Black River At West. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Several thousand acres of agricultural and lowland become inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 14 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rising again tonight, reaching flood stage just after midnight, then cresting near 18 feet on Saturday. - Flood stage is 15 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Big Black River West 15.0 14.0 Thu 6 pm CDT 17.7 17.9 17.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Friday morning.
